name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook mitigates an incident where an attacker exploited a web application to execute shell commands and exfiltrate data.

action--c2e2e093-b744-4c20-8f4f-a0e8e8f1.name: Kill malicious process
action--c2e2e093-b744-4c20-8f4f-a0e8e8f1.description: Terminate the process associated with the malicious activity.

parallel--0d3e7b26-e04a-4cac-afa1-ba3caf.name: Mitigation Actions
parallel--0d3e7b26-e04a-4cac-afa1-ba3caf.description: Execute multiple mitigation actions in parallel.

action--7cc2a728-f30d-4773-ac7b-3cc2c7d4.name: Remove unauthorized user
action--7cc2a728-f30d-4773-ac7b-3cc2c7d4.description: Remove the backdoor user if it exists.

commands.command: if getent passwd backdoor_user; then userdel backdoor_user; fi

action--d1e7c705-4d75-4ad4-84f7-44e788b9.name: Scan for malware
action--d1e7c705-4d75-4ad4-84f7-44e788b9.description: Perform a recursive scan for malware until the system is clean.

commands.command: while ! clamscan -r /home | grep 'Infected files: 0'; do sleep 60; done

action--a7d7e9c1-4b6f-4237-88b1-de8aa1fe.name: Block external IP addresses
action--a7d7e9c1-4b6f-4237-88b1-de8aa1fe.description: Block communications to known malicious external IP addresses.

action--f9f2b3a2-3e6d-45a4-bbda-ab0b5e7d.name: Review user activity logs
action--f9f2b3a2-3e6d-45a4-bbda-ab0b5e7d.description: Check the activity logs for suspicious actions by the unauthorized user.
